text: Hamza Hamry (; born 12 January 1995 in Kairouan) nicknamed The Joker, is a Tunisian he is a former judoka and professional mixed martial artist and professional bareknuckle boxer competing in the Featherweight division of the Extreme Fighting Series. he is the first fighter that was born and raised in an Arab country to be signed with BYB. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Mixed martial artists Category:Tunisian sportspeople Category:Judoka
title: Hamza Hamry
